example.text: Great to see these continued benefits from the bipartisan Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act. Look forward to continuing to advance environmental protection and restoration projects through the Great Lakes Restoration Initiative in our region. [[url]]

Great to see these continued benefits from the bipartisan Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act. Look forward to continuing to advance environmental protection and restoration projects through the Great Lakes Restoration Initiative in our region. [[url]]

Great to see these continued benefits from the bipartisan Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act. Look forward to continuing to advance environmental protection and restoration projects through the Great Lakes Restoration Initiative in our region. [[url]]

Spoke on the House floor this week to highlight a Steel Caucus letter on the recent surge of steel imports from Mexico. I look forward to continuing to work with my colleagues and the Administration to defend American workers and steel manufacturers. [[url]]

I appreciate the continued leadership of Ranking Member Bobby Scott and my colleagues on the Education and Workforce Committee, and I encourage all of my colleagues to join me in standing with our workers in supporting the PRO Act.
